alert.note: Alert for Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:11PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Gila County through 400 PM MST... At 311 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles southwest of Hilltop, or 14 miles northeast of Globe, moving west at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Gila County. This includes US Highway 60 between mile markers 255 and 277. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Globe, Miami; San Carlos; Southeast Gila County
